original_title: La Bamba 2: Hell Is a Drag
overview: An all drag, art house, dark comedy, parody sequel to the 1987 Ritchie Valens biopic. A failed artist is sucked into Hell and a makes a deal with the devil: rescuing his rock n' roll idol from a band of evil dead musicians in exchange for eternal fame and a one-way ticket back to the land of the living.
title: La Bamba 2: Hell Is a Drag
